forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few clouds. High 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few clouds. High 54F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High 56F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low near 50F. WSW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
